entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Illegal instruction in libhostfxr.so #109131
  • Publishing Blazor with AOT:true hangs then fails on generic partial-scoped class references #109128
  • [HttpStress] `H3_REQUEST_REJECTED` in Get / Get Slow #109121
    10.0.0
  • Version conflicts while building runtime repo in source-build config #109120
  • int.TryParse has become ambigous when used with dynamic #109117
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Migrate to Compose plugin in Linux pipelines #109113
    Future
  • Native SIGSEGV crashes in mono_method_to_ir #109111
  • CMake doesn't find brotli modules when building with CLR_CMAKE_USE_SYSTEM_BROTLI #109105
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 26 Regressions on 10/18/2024 8:32:15 PM - Churn from Block Layout Changes #109122
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 10/15/2024 10:23:56 PM - Cloning Change #109123
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 10/14/2024 10:37:27 PM #109124
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 5 Regressions on 10/17/2024 5:07:04 PM #109125
  • Running console application that creates and joins with short-lived threads leaks handles when debugger is attached #109103
  • Event Tracing for TransactionScope does not work. #109101
  • [API Proposal]: Add static factory for InvalidEnumArgumentException #109099
  • [API Proposal]: Extend the functionality of `TimeSpan` custom format strings #109095
    Future

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'fgFirstColdBlock == nullptr' #109100
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTestWithMcj/BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #108698
  • [release/9.0] HostActivation installer tests are expecting 9.0.0 but getting 9.0.0-ci in PRs #108994
    9.0.0
  • DateTime.Now returns incorrect time on windows computer when time zone has changed #31043
    Future
  • Can't use System::IntPtr #109115
  • [NET9] [REGRESSION] Gmail API fail with TieredCompilation disabled #108969
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 10/14/2024 10:37:27 PM #109126
  • `IPGlobalProperties.DomainName` returns `"(none)"` on Linux #104882
    Future
  • [HTTP/3] [HttpStress] QuicException: Stream aborted by peer (258) in `(POST Duplex | PUT) Slow` #100534
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8.0 MAUI App: TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeToUtc(datetime) returns inconsitent results on different paltforms #109106
  • CMake Error: 'arm64' is an unsupported architecture #108987
  • publishing Blazor with AOT is now broken in 8.0.10 AspNetCore #109089
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Not possbile to run locally with docker #108551
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: public ctor for CookieException with string parameter #95965
    10.0.0
  • [.NET 9] DllImport with Custom Marshaler Passes non-null address when `null` value for field is specified. #109033

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Permit unencrypted key exports from CNG #109134
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement `ISOSDacInterface::GetModule` and `IXCLRDataModule::GetFileName` #109133
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [ActivityInfo] Avoid writing extra byte by updating length #109132
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add X509Certificate2Collection.FindByThumbprint #109130
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Introduce transient code mechanism for SPCL. #109129
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use properties for some [GeneratedRegex]s #109118
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] fix redundant CRLF response during SMTP negotiate #109112
    area-System.Net
  • FileShare change to ReadWrite #109104
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Sync with PR#107282: Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks. #109102
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [GC] Add const int gc_heap::n_heaps = 1 and remove #ifdefs #109094
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Permit unencrypted key exports from CNG #109119
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Run `Compiler::fgDetermineFirstColdBlock` at most once #109127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix return address hijacking with CET #109074
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Lazily read global string/object method table pointers #109093
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Initialize managed and native values in the ICustomMarshaler marshaler to null when the other is null. #109096
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix IPGlobalProperties.DomainName to return string.Empty when domain name is not set #107241
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [cmake] add osx support in CMakePresets.json #109061
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Put brotli on the FetchContent plan" #109108
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • [API Implementation]: Expose CookieException constructors #109026
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Track visited blocks in LSRA with post-order number-based `BitVec` #108932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change return type for MemberData tests to array #109090
    needs-area-label
  • Initialize managed and native values in the ICustomMarshaler marshaler to null when the other is null. #109092
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [ilasm] Don't try to overrun the buffer in emitMetaData #109086
    needs-area-label
  • Remove ldsfld quirk #108606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove support for emitting and loading Itanium-64 assemblies #108084
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] PrecodeStubs and CDacMetadata contracts #109030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • [draft] [GC] Don't promote gen0 when it is mostly objects moved to the finalization queue #109085
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix GC stress log and analysis #108655
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Switch to Azure Linux VM #108967
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • Unify dotnet/runtime on using Arcade -publish #108990
    area-Infrastructure
  • Replace Delegate MethodInfo cache with the MethodDesc #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • [main] guard agains empty Accept address #108616
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Expose GCInfo size and EH clause count as metrics #109035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `unsafe` modifier from `Memory<T>.Span` #106085
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Update stepping through ExternalMethodFixup under the Debugger #108942
    area-VM-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #108945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Avoid spilling loads of static readonly variables #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Opt `emitLoadImmediate` #109062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT/ARM64] Generate frames compatible with Apple compact unwinding #107766
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-CodeGen-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Improve performance of interface method resolution in ILC #103066
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
